alert.note: Alert for St. Croix (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 4:39PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern St. Croix County through 515 PM CDT... At 439 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm over Hammond, or 12 miles northeast of River Falls, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Woodville around 455 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Glenwood City. This includes Interstate 94 in Wisconsin between mile markers 13 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
